SELECT id, backendtype, backendname, host, port, sparehost, priority, basedn, filter, pubkey, timeout, retrycnt, usernamerule, delimiter, enabled, policy, domainid FROM
(select top $pageSize$ * from otppms_backend where id not in
(select top $startRow$ id from otppms_backend order by id DESC) order by id DESC) otppms_backend where 1=1
ORDER BY id DESC
